message_1: Suppose you are given a message "hello world" and you want to create a hash using the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function. What is the resulting hash value in hexadecimal format?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash of the message "hello world", you can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the resulting hash value in hexadecimal format:

`7509e5bda0c762d2bac7f90d758b5b2263fa01ccbc542ab5e3df163be08e6ca9`
